title: Easy Pokawa Poké
ingredients: 1 base: brown rice, quinoa or carrots
Veggies: carrot, edamame, radish, cucumber, avocado, red cabbage
1 protein: chicken breast, ham, egg, tofu.

title: Healthier cookies
instructions: Traditional oven 180C degrees for 10 min

title: Low sugar Jam
instructions: Add frozen berries, sugar, lemon juice and water into small saucepan. Bring to a boil then reduce heat to simmer. Stir in chia seeds and simmer for about 15 minutes or until thickened; stirring often. Remove from heat and add vanilla. Allow to cool.

title: Vicky’s waffles
ingredients: Instead of flour, flour + almond meal + hemp seeds + chia seeds (in approx equal proportions)
Keep up to 6 days in fridge.
instructions: Also add 1 tsp of vanilla extra and some blueberries for the sweeter variety 2 cups almond flour (or 1 cup wholewheat + 1 cup almond) Oven: 160 degrees for 50-55 minutes.

title: Traditional Banana Bread
ingredients: 1.5 cups wholemeal flour (200g) (modification: substitute 0.5 cup by almond meal)
instructions: 75g melted butter (modification: peanut butter or any nut butter) 1 cup brown sugar (modification: honey or maple syrup) Oven 180 traditional, for 55-65 min.

title: Easy low carb pancakes
ingredients: 1/2 cup milk — I used unsweetened coconut milk
2 teaspoon granulated sweetener of choice optional
½ cup whole milk, coconut cream or oat milk.
instructions: 2 teaspoon coconut oil melted 2 tablespoons unsalted butter melted, for the waffle maker
notes: For 6 people Makes 6 large waffles ½ teaspoon stevia glycerite("https://www.iherb.com/pr/now-foods-better-stevia-zero-calorie-liquid-sweetener-organic-glycerite-8-fl-oz-237-ml/861") (equals 2 tablespoons sugar) — can also be skipped. 2 cups almond flour("https://www.target.com/p/bob-39-s-red-mill-gluten-free-super-fine-almond-flour-16oz/-/A-14777847") blanched finely ground (8 ounces)

title: Lili’s keto Granola
ingredients: Let cool and crisp before storing in sealed container.
instructions: 6 tbsp Besti Monk Fruit Allulose Blend 1/4 cup Unsalted butter (measured solid, thenmelted; use coconut oil or ghee for dairy-free, or use salted butter if yournuts are unsalted) Pre-heat oven at 160 degrees. Mix nuts in food processor, then add egg white, melted butter and vanilla extract. Don’t over process to keep clusters. Pour over lined baking tray, bake for 15-18 minutes.

title: Couscous de poulet aux 7 légumes
ingredients: Tajine de poulet aux abricots et au miel
1 c. c. de graines de cumin
1 c. c. de coriandre en poudre
1 c. c. de gingembre en poudre
1 c. c. de cannelle en poudre
1/2 c. c. de piment en poudre
85 g de dattes dénoyautées et coupées en deux
instructions: 50 g of butter for the semolina Instructions: Peel and grate the fresh ginger. Peel and slice the onion. Wash and prepare all the vegetables. Heat the olive oil in a large casserole dish. Brown the onion with ginger + spices (cumin, ras el-hanout, bay leaves). Add the chicken and then salt and pepper. Cover with 3 liters of water, bring to the boil, then add the vegetables EXCEPT eggplant and zucchini. Leave to simmer for 1 hour over low heat. Then add the eggplants. Heat 20 cl of water, then pour it over the semolina in a large salad bowl. Add the raisins and leave to swell for 15 minutes. When the semolina has swelled, fluff it with a fork. Add the zucchini, chickpeas and saffron to the broth. Cover and cook for 40 minutes.

title: Toppings juste avant de servir
instructions: 80 g toasted almonds 1. Cut the chicken into 3 cm pieces then brown it in the oil. Reserve a tablespoon of hot oil in a casserole dish. Drain on absorbent paper. 2. Heat the remaining oil in the casserole dish to brown the onions, garlic and all the spices. 3. Return the chicken to the casserole dish with the broth and water. Let simmer for 1 hour. Remove the lid and continue cooking for 30 minutes over medium heat. When the sauce has thickened, add the dates, honey and almonds. Garnish with fresh cilantro when serving. Prepare sauce first in a pan (about 25 min, starting with slow cooking onion for 20 min); then break in eggs gently and cover in sauce. Finish with 10 min in oven at 180 degrees. 3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil1 large onion, halved and thinly sliced1 large red bell pepper, seeded and thinly sliced3 garlic cloves, thinly sliced1 teaspoon ground cumin1 teaspoon sweet paprika⅛ teaspoon ground cayenne, or to taste1 can whole plum tomatoes with their juices, coarsely chopped (800g)¾ teaspoon kosher salt, plus more as needed¼ teaspoon black pepper, plus more as needed1¼ cups feta, crumbled6 large eggsToppings: Chopped cilantro, Hot sauce (optional)

title: Lili’s Overnight Chia Pudding
ingredients: Pâte à tarte express de Babou
Mix everything, leave to rest for 1 hour.

title: For a big tray
ingredients: 1-2 bricks of liquid cream (or light creme fraiche)
instructions: Bake In the oven traditional 200 degrees for 20 min

title: Taboulé Libanais

instructions: A little bit of bulgar wheat (fine or medium)

title: Prendre un grand saladier; y écraser la levure
ingredients: milk: heat a glass of milk in the microwave; set aside
add 2tbsp of flour, salt, and sugar to the bowl. mix the sourdough gently, add the lukewarm milk little by little (1 glass).
heat the rest of the milk over low heat in a saucepan
in the glass, put the butter to melt
add the flour to the large salad bowl, gradually add the lukewarm milk, mix the dough. Then add the melted butter.
let the egg whites turn into stiff peaks.
Slowly add the beaten egg whites to the dough.
Laisser la pâte reposer et lever une bonne heure sous un torchon propre.

title: Nico’s Perfect guac
instructions: 1/2 small white onion, diced to a powder (onion powder equivalent: 1 tsp)

title: Hummus
instructions: 1/2 squeezed lime mix 3 tbsp quality extra virgin olive oil drizzled as you blend the rest

title: Sweet potato, chickpea and coconut milk curry de Jakob

title: Nico’s White fish Ceviche
instructions: Roasted aubergine with saffron yoghurt Eggplants prep: 3 medium aubergines, 2cm round slices brushed in generous olive oil, salt and pepper, oven 220C for 35mins

instructions: Top with roasted pine nuts and basil leaves

title: Marinaded lamb with coriander and honey
Pili Salad
ingredients: A bit of yellow bell pepper (optional)
instructions: Mix lettuce, rocket and baby spinach 1 large mango (can be replaced by pomegranate)

title: Dressing
instructions: 1/4 cup Olive oil (whisk with mustard) Coriander leaves, chopped finely

title: Ruud’s Afghan lentil dal
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups low-sodium chicken broth (or vegetable broth)
instructions: 1 finely chopped medium onion 2 cloves minced garlic 1 1/2 tbsp. fincely minced fresh ginger Instructions: Cook onion, garlic and ginger in oil till soft and translucent. Add spices, broth and set to boil, then simmer for 15 mins. Serve with a spoonful of plain yogurt and lime juice on top, and warm pita or nan bread.

title: Jamie Oliver (super easy) Onion Chutney
instructions: 3lb cooking Onions - cook low temp. to melt

title: Once melted (translucent), add
instructions: 1,5 tbsp dark brown sugar - increase heat to caramelize

title: And finally add at slower temp again to simmer
Baked sweet potatoes with honey
instructions: Bake in oven at 230 Celsius for 30 mins

title: Peter Mac Super8 potato salad
instructions: Potatoes roasted Bacon roasted

title: Peter Mac Super8 rocket & pear salad
instructions: Serve with balsamic dressing

title: Peter Mac Super8 rocket & prosciutto salad
instructions: Serve with balsamic dressing

title: Jamie Oliver Chickpea salad
ingredients: 1 handful fresh green or purple basil , finely ripped
instructions: 410 g tinned chickpeas , drained, or around 4 large handfuls of soaked and cooked chickpeas 1 handful fresh mint , chopped

title: Regular moussaka
instructions: Eggplant chili stir fry:  1 1/2 tablespoons malt vinegar 1 1/2 tablespoons sesame oil 1 1/2 tablespoons brown sugar 1 1/2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 1/2 tablespoons sriracha  Peanut oil, to shallow-fry 1 large eggplant, quartered lengthways, thinly sliced 1 tablespoon sesame seeds, toasted Thinly sliced fresh green chilli, to serve

title: Thai beef salad
instructions: Chili sliced

title: Hernan’s Aji
ingredients: 2 small chilies - cut in length, very finely, removing seeds
Salt 3 pinches - to macerate the chillies
10cm spring onion (white side), cut very finely
Let chilies macerate in salt using a mortar, leave in a bowl
instructions: Lots of coriander, very finely chopped Chop onion, coriander, add to bowl (dominating colours should be white onion and green coriander) Add approx 2 tbsp of water to bowl Add approx 2 tsp lime juice Add a bit more salt if missing

title: Big Mamma’s Eggplant parmigiana
instructions: 4 eggplants, sliced 1/2 cm Frying oil Drain egglants, cover them in flour and pan fry in sunflower oil. Then in a large oven tray layer: tomato sauce, eggplant, mozzarella, Parmesan, basil. Repeat 4 times. Bake in the oven at 190C for 20-25 min.

title: Ana’s pimentoncitos rellenos
ingredients: Pimentones se parten por la mitad y se sacan las pepas. Se hierven en agua con vinagre, azúcar y un poco de sal por 3 minutos.
Se cocina la carde del chorizo, se saca la grada, se revuelve con queso crema, sal, pimienta, paprika ahumada. Se llenan los pimentones.

title: Bok Choi and mushroom stir fry
ingredients: 500g book Choi, stems off, washed, 2 mins
1 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp sesame oil, salt & pepper, sesame seeds
instructions: 1/2 onion, julienned, cook a bit

title: Veggie leftover fried rice
ingredients: 1 tbsp oil+ 1tbsp ginger & 2 garlic & chili -> 30 secs
instructions: 1 tbsp oil + 2 eggs whisked -> coat wok, break, set aside 1 tbsp oil + 1 white onion & 2 carrots diced & peas + cook 5 mins -> set aside 2 cups spinach/kale/book Choi & 3 green onions diced + rest of veggies and egg

title: Set off heat + 2tbsp soy & 1 teaspoon sesame oil & tamarin sauce
notes: For 2: A recipe we learned from the owners of a small restaurant in Siem Rep where we went on our honeymoon in Cambodian in 2019.

title: New York Times Corn & Coconut Chili soup
ingredients: 5 ears yellow or bicolor corn (or 5 cups frozen corn kernels)
2 small red potatoes (6 to 8 ounces total), cut into 1/2-inch cubes
Cut eggplant in disks and de-bitter with salt
instructions: 2 shallots, thinly sliced into rings 3 garlic cloves, minced 1 (1-inch) piece ginger, peeled and minced 1 serrano chile (or other chile), minced 2 ½ cups vegetable broth (or 2 1/2 cups of hot water whisked with 1 1/2 teaspoons jarred bouillon) Torn cilantro leaves, toasted coconut flakes, chopped roasted peanuts, crispy fried shallots, lime wedges and more sliced Serrano chiles, to serve (optional) Garlic Parmesan oven-roasted eggplant 6 tablespoons unsalted butter melted Melt butter in one bowl and mix rest of ingredients in another. Dip eggplant in butter and then in rest. Oven bake at 200C for 15 min + 7 min flip side.

title: Meatballs in tahini sauce
instructions: Shallow fry meatballs for 2 minutes Bake at 220 C for 5 min + tahini sauce and then another 10 min

title: BBQ ribs (1 rack ~2kg)
ingredients: 3 tbsp each of: chili powder, sugar, salt, black pepper
1 tsp each of: cumin, cinnamon, garlic powder, smoked paprika
Lay in 350g Greek yoghurt with chili flakes and 1/2 lime zest
instructions: Remove film from rack; rub 3 tbsp sunflower oil; rub spices all over; stab rack; pack it in foil meat-side down Bake at 230C for 2 hours; take out and flip, rub BBQ(+sriracha mix) all over; broil for 15 more mins 350g cherry tomatoes mixed in bowl with 3 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp cumin, 1/2 tsp brown sugar, 3 garlic cloves sliced, thyme and oregano, 1/2 lime skin strips, salt and pepper Oven 220C for 20min + 8min fan grill 2 eggplants, burn in grill for 1 hr, scoop flesh and leave in colander for another hour Mix with 25 cherry tomatoes halved, 1 bell pepper chopped, I small red onion chopped, 40g coriander/parsley, chili, 70ml sunflower oil, 80ml apple cider vinegar, 1 tbsp cumin, salt and paper 6 eggplants, pricked and baked at 200C for 1 hour, scoop flesh out 1 onion, diced and sweated in pan with a bit of olive oil Add one can of diced tomatoes and eggplant to pot with onion, then oven 200C for 1.5 hours, add lots of salt and pepper

title: Beef stroganoff de Grand-Papa
ingredients: Nico’s One pot pasta with ‘nduja and tomato
instructions: 2 onions, slidlced in half rings, cooked medium temp till translucent. Add 1 teaspoon of mustard and mix. Add 400g beef, fined diced, high heat till cooked. Then add 2 tbps sour cream and mix. Add salt and pepper at the end. Pan fry 1 garlic cloves and stalk of basil chopped, then add 3 tsp of ‘nduja. When cooked ad 400g diced tomatoes with juice and herbs. Add 200g of pasta, salt and pepper and cook for 20 min. Serve with fresh mozzarella (lots) and basil leaves.

title: Red onion and chili confit
instructions: 1 red onion chopped coarse and 1 Birdseye, chopped fine and I olive oil on low for 20 mins Add 1/8 cup red wine vinegar, 1/8 cup sherry vinegar, 1/4 cup water, 2 tsp brown sugar, mix and cook on medium for 10 mins

title: Baba ganoush
instructions: 1kg eggplants, halved lengthwise, ribbed with oil on meat side and facing skin side up, oven grill 220C for 40 mins Scoop flesh, sieve for 5 mins, then bowl with 2 minced garlic, 1 lemon juice, 1/4 cup tahini, 1/3 cup police oil, punch of smoked paprika and cumin, salt

title: Pork bulgogi
instructions: 750g pork shoulder or beef steak in thin slices Marinate in 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2tbps brown sugar, 2tbps sesame oil, 3 minced garlic, 1tbps ginger grated, 1tbps chili sauce sriracha

title: Szechuan sauce
instructions: 2 tablespoons brown sugar

title: Szichuan / Sichuan glaze/ sauce
instructions: 2 tablespoons maple syrup or brown sugar

title: Miso glaze
instructions: 3 Tbsp brown sugar

title: Thai papaya salad
instructions: 4 garlic cloves minced Long green beans diced

title: Crispy pork belly with red curry sauce
ingredients: 150g pork belly per person, Prick holes in skin
instructions: Rub flesh with Chinese cooking wine, 5 spice powder, salt and pepper. Marinate 12h if possible Brush skin with vinegar, make salt bed on skin, bake 180c for 1h Take crust off, fan grill for 20 mins more Sauce: boil 400ml coconut milk with a bit of oil, add 200g red curry paste. Top with 3 limes and zest, 2tbps panela, basil
notes: Our favorite dish from Cookie (Melbourne) and Rice Paper Scissors (Melbourne)

title: Nico’s Salmon ceviche
instructions: 200g salmon diced small, marinate in juice from 4 limes for 30 mins Mix with 1 tomato, 1/2 red onion, 1/2 cup coriander, 1 Tbsp olive oil, 1 pickled jalapeño and some juice, 1 Serrano chili, 1 tsp dried oregano

title: Lemongrass beef Bo Bun
instructions: 250g stir fry beef to marinate 2 1/2 tbps lemongrass, minced 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 chili, chopped 1 bunch of coriander, chopped

title: Aioli
ingredients: 1 egg, yolk first so it doesn’t cut
instructions: Whip hard without moving blender

title: Chimichurri
ingredients: Grated mozzarella on top and 2 white onions in rings to top
instructions: 1/2 cup chopped parsley 3 garlic cloves minced 2 red chilies seeded and chopped For tha sauce: blend 1.2kg green tomatillos sautéed in butter, 2 chilies, 1/2 cup coriander, 1 cup light cream, 2 eggs 6 chicken breasts, salt and pepper, boiled and pulled 18 corn tortillas, pan fried in sunflower oil with some sauce each, folded with some chicken and stacked. Pour sauce over stack too. Oven in 180C for 20 mins. Serve with rice.

title: Kale and quinoa salad
ingredients: Dressing: 1/2 cup olive oil, 4 Tbsp lemon juice, 2 small garlic, 1 tsp Dijon,  salt and pepper
Massage 6 cups of kale with 1/2 dressing
instructions: 2 cups cooked quinoa, 1 can chickpeas, 1 broccoli head, 1 avo, 1 pomegranate, roasted almonds, feta

title: Bring 1.5L beef broth to a simmer for at least 30 Minsk no but yeah
instructions: Toast 1 quartered onion, 2 garlic cloves and a thumb of ginger in a pan, then add to broth Toast 2 star anise, 1/2 tsp cloves, 1 tsp coriander seeds, 1 cinnamon stick, 1 stick lemongrass on a pan, then add to broth Add 1 Tbsp fish sauce, 1.5tbsp soy sauce and 1tbsp panela to the broth Make flat rice pho noodles and place in plates, top with thinly sliced beef (place in freezer for 15 mins before in cling film to slice thin). Add boiling broth and top with chopped chili, Thai basil, coriander and spring onion

title: Best bolognese sauce
instructions: Heat up 2 garlic cloves minced and 1 onion in olive oil

title: Brown 500g minced beef, add 1/2 cup red wine and 2 beef bouillon cubes, simmer
instructions: Add 1 can of diced tomatoes, 2 Tbsp tomato paste, 2 tsp sugar, 2 tsp Worcestershire sauce, 2 bay leaves, 1 tsp dried thyme, 1 tsp dried oregano

title: Thai prawns
ingredients: Marinade: oil, 1/2 lemon with peel, 1 shallot, 4 garlic cloves, 1 chili, lemongrass, 2.5cm ginger, mint, coriander
instructions: Toss 20 king prawn in marinade for 10 mins, then cook until pink

title: Coconut rice
instructions: 1 tsp daily, 1 tbsp brown sugar Boil + 20 mins covered on low + 5 mins rest covered

title: Simple pancakes
instructions: 4 tsp butter for cooking Doughy chocolate chip cookies Oven at 180C Melt 110g of butter, then mix with 100g sugar Add 1 tsp vanilla, 1 egg Add 180g flour, 1/2 tsp baking soda, pinch of salt Roll into a ball, add 150g chocolate chips Split into 12 balls, bake 10 mins and rest 15 mins.
